snippet: Federal prosecutors on Wednesday charged a Houston man with illegally exporting microelectronics to Russian military and intelligence agencies for use in their weapons systems.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Houston electronics executive Alexander Fishenko with illegally exporting microelectronics to Russian military and intelligence agencies as part of a sophisticated network aimed at supplying American high-tech goods for use in Russian weapons systems.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors on Wednesday charged a Houston man with illegally exporting microelectronics to Russian military and intelligence agencies for use in their weapons systems.

headline.seo: Texas Executive Accused of Illegal Exports to Russia
headline.main: Texas: Executive Accused of Illegal Exports to Russia
headline.print_headline: Texas: Executive Accused of Illegal Exports To Russia
